BackstoryDef.title: Vault-Tec Accountant
BackstoryDef.description: Kept the books for Vault-Tec, tracking every cap and credit. Knew the value of a dollar and the secrets behind the company’s mysterious projects.

BackstoryDef.title: RobCo Technician
BackstoryDef.description: Worked the night shift at a RobCo factory, repairing Protectrons and Mister Handys. Knows their way around a circuit board and a coffee machine.

BackstoryDef.title: Nuka-Cola Salesperson
BackstoryDef.description: Sold the world’s favorite soft drink door-to-door, always with a smile and a catchy jingle. Knows every flavor and every secret recipe rumor.

BackstoryDef.title: Atomic Age Homemaker
BackstoryDef.description: Kept the house spotless and the family fed, with help from a trusty Mister Handy. Dreamed of winning the annual Nuka-Cola sweepstakes and vacationing in a Vault.

BackstoryDef.title: Vault Lottery Hopeful
BackstoryDef.description: Spent years entering the Vault-Tec lottery, hoping for a spot in a shiny new Vault. Read every pamphlet and practiced “duck and cover” drills religiously.

BackstoryDef.title: Red Menace Comic Artist
BackstoryDef.description: Drew panels for the Red Menace comic series, dreaming up heroes to fight the Communist threat. Imaginative, patriotic, and always ready with a witty one-liner.

BackstoryDef.title: Police Officer
BackstoryDef.description: Patrolled the streets in a classic cruiser, keeping the peace and watching for Communist spies. Trained in investigation, negotiation, and the art of the baton.

BackstoryDef.title: Elementary School Teacher
BackstoryDef.description: Taught children about the wonders of science and the dangers of Communism. Led “duck and cover” drills and handed out Sugar Bombs as rewards.

BackstoryDef.title: Atomic Age Doctor
BackstoryDef.description: Practiced medicine in a gleaming prewar hospital, using the latest in Rad-X and stimpaks. Dedicated to keeping families healthy and ready for the future.

BackstoryDef.title: College Student
BackstoryDef.description: Studied engineering and nuclear physics at a prestigious university, hoping to land a job at Vault-Tec or RobCo. Quick to learn, but a little naïve about the world outside the classroom.

BackstoryDef.title: Giddyup Buttercup Factory Worker
BackstoryDef.description: Assembled toy horses at the Giddyup Buttercup factory, dreaming of a brighter future for America’s children. Knows the ins and outs of mass production and the smell of fresh plastic.

BackstoryDef.title: Silver Shroud Radio Host
BackstoryDef.description: Hosted the Silver Shroud radio show, thrilling listeners with tales of justice and intrigue. Charismatic and quick-witted, always ready with a dramatic monologue.

BackstoryDef.title: Red Rocket Attendant
BackstoryDef.description: Pumped gas and fixed cars at the local Red Rocket station. Handy with a wrench and always ready to chat about the latest fusion-powered vehicles.

BackstoryDef.title: Vault-Tec PR Specialist
BackstoryDef.description: Crafted cheerful ads and reassuring press releases for Vault-Tec, convincing the public that everything was under control. Master of spin and optimism in uncertain times.

BackstoryDef.title: Suburban Gardener
BackstoryDef.description: Maintained a pristine lawn and vegetable garden in the suburbs, winning local awards for best tomatoes. Knows how to coax life from the soil—even if it’s a little irradiated.

BackstoryDef.title: Red Rocket Grease Monkey
BackstoryDef.description: Spent days tuning up fusion engines and waxing chrome at Red Rocket. Knows every bolt and gasket in a Chryslus Highwayman, and can swap a fusion core blindfolded.

BackstoryDef.title: Hubris Comics Writer
BackstoryDef.description: Penned wild adventures for Grognak the Barbarian and the Unstoppables. Imagination fueled by Sugar Bombs and late-night radio serials.

BackstoryDef.title: Poseidon Energy Technician
BackstoryDef.description: Maintained reactors and power grids for Poseidon Energy. Knows how to handle a wrench, a voltmeter, and a surprise radroach infestation.

BackstoryDef.title: Super Duper Mart Clerk
BackstoryDef.description: Rang up groceries and restocked shelves at Super Duper Mart. Knows the price of every snack cake and the secret to surviving a rush of hungry shoppers.

BackstoryDef.title: Radio News Anchor
BackstoryDef.description: Delivered the latest headlines and government bulletins over the airwaves. Calm under pressure, with a voice trusted by millions—at least until the sirens sounded.

BackstoryDef.title: Chryslus Motors Assembly Worker
BackstoryDef.description: Built fusion-powered cars on the Chryslus assembly line, dreaming of driving a cherry-red Highwayman. Knows the hum of machinery and the pride of American engineering.

BackstoryDef.title: Red Menace Cartoon Voice Actor
BackstoryDef.description: Brought heroes and villains to life on the Red Menace cartoon show. Skilled in dramatic delivery, impersonations, and keeping kids glued to their TV sets.

BackstoryDef.title: Red Menace Propaganda Writer
BackstoryDef.description: Wrote stirring speeches and pamphlets warning of the Communist threat. Master of catchy slogans and dramatic flair, always ready to rally the public.

BackstoryDef.title: Nuka-World Entertainer
BackstoryDef.description: Performed at Nuka-World, dazzling crowds with magic tricks and song. Knows how to keep an audience smiling—even when the power flickers.

BackstoryDef.title: Suburban Scout Leader
BackstoryDef.description: Led neighborhood scout troops in camping, first aid, and atomic safety drills. Knows how to tie knots, pitch tents, and keep kids calm during air raid sirens.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Infantry
BackstoryDef.description: Served as a foot soldier in the United States Army before the Great War. Trained in marksmanship, tactics, and survival, this soldier saw action in several major conflicts and learned the value of discipline, teamwork, and perseverance under fire.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Infantry Veteran
BackstoryDef.description: Having survived multiple tours of duty, this veteran infantryman is hardened by years of combat. Their experience in urban warfare and trench fighting has made them resourceful and resilient, with a deep understanding of battlefield tactics.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Conscriptee
BackstoryDef.description: Drafted into service during the final years before the bombs fell, this conscriptee received only basic training before being sent to the front lines. Their experience is marked by confusion, fear, and a desperate will to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Scout
BackstoryDef.description: Specialized in reconnaissance and stealth, this scout operated ahead of the main force, gathering intelligence and reporting enemy positions. Their training focused on survival, navigation, and observation.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Radio Operator
BackstoryDef.description: Responsible for maintaining communications on the battlefield, this radio operator relayed orders and called for support under fire. Their technical skills and quick thinking often made the difference between victory and defeat.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Logistics Specialist
BackstoryDef.description: Managed the supply lines and resources that kept the army moving. Skilled in organization, inventory, and problem-solving, this specialist ensured troops had the equipment and provisions needed for survival and victory.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Vehicle Mechanic
BackstoryDef.description: Kept the army’s vehicles running in the harshest conditions. Trained in repair and maintenance, this mechanic could fix anything from jeeps to tanks, often under fire or in the field.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Field Cook
BackstoryDef.description: Prepared meals for soldiers in camps and on the front lines. Adapted recipes to limited supplies and kept morale high with hot food, even in the worst conditions.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Medic
BackstoryDef.description: Provided medical care and triage for wounded soldiers. Trained in emergency medicine and battlefield first aid, this medic saved lives under fire and in field hospitals.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Communications Technician
BackstoryDef.description: Maintained and operated the radios and electronic equipment that kept units connected. Skilled in troubleshooting, repair, and encryption, this technician was vital for coordination and intelligence.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Vertibird Pilot
BackstoryDef.description: Trained to fly the advanced Vertibird transport and gunship, this pilot mastered both troop deployment and aerial combat. Their quick reflexes and nerves of steel made them invaluable in high-risk missions.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Aviation Mechanic
BackstoryDef.description: Responsible for maintaining and repairing military aircraft, this mechanic kept Vertibirds, jets, and bombers in top condition. Their technical expertise ensured safe flights and mission success.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Jet Fighter Pilot
BackstoryDef.description: Flew high-speed jet fighters in defense of the United States. Skilled in aerial dogfighting, navigation, and rapid decision-making, this pilot was a master of the skies.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Bomber Pilot
BackstoryDef.description: Piloted heavy bombers on strategic missions, delivering devastating payloads deep behind enemy lines. Their calm under pressure and teamwork with their crew were essential for survival and success.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Lieutenant
BackstoryDef.description: Commissioned as a junior officer, this lieutenant led a platoon through the chaos of the pre-war years. Responsible for the welfare and discipline of their soldiers, they learned leadership under fire and the importance of quick decision-making.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Captain
BackstoryDef.description: As a company commander, this captain managed logistics, training, and combat operations for dozens of soldiers. Their experience in both administration and battle forged a strong, adaptable leader.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Major
BackstoryDef.description: Tasked with overseeing battalion-level operations, this major coordinated complex missions and managed both officers and enlisted personnel. Their strategic thinking and organizational skills were vital in the pre-war military machine.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army Colonel
BackstoryDef.description: Commanding a regiment, this colonel was responsible for hundreds of soldiers and the execution of large-scale operations. Their leadership and tactical acumen shaped the course of battles and the fate of their men.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Army General
BackstoryDef.description: One of the highest-ranking officers in the pre-war U.S. Army, this general directed entire divisions and shaped military policy. Their strategic vision and command presence were legendary, influencing the outcome of the nation's greatest conflicts.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Winter Warfare Specialist
BackstoryDef.description: Trained and deployed in the harsh Alaskan wilderness, this soldier specialized in winter warfare, survival, and reconnaissance. Endured freezing temperatures and blizzards while defending the frontier against enemy incursions.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Recon Scout
BackstoryDef.description: Served as a scout in Alaska, navigating treacherous terrain and gathering intelligence on enemy movements. Skilled in stealth, navigation, and survival in extreme cold.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Marine Rifleman
BackstoryDef.description: Served as a rifleman in the United States Marine Corps, trained in amphibious assaults and close-quarters combat. Known for discipline, adaptability, and courage under fire.

BackstoryDef.title: USS Democracy Marine
BackstoryDef.description: Issued an experimental prototype of submersible Marine armor aboard the USS Democracy, this Marine kept watch within the boat’s tight corridors and led boarding and security operations below the waves. Hardened by claustrophobic sea duty and brutal close-quarters combat, they relied on the armor’s plating and specialized systems to repel raiders, lead boarding parties, and carry out dangerous missions along irradiated coastal and underwater sites.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Marine Demolitions Specialist
BackstoryDef.description: Expert in explosives and breaching operations, this Marine was responsible for clearing obstacles and sabotaging enemy positions. Their technical skills and nerves of steel were vital in high-risk missions.

BackstoryDef.title: U.S. Navy Corpsman
BackstoryDef.description: Provided emergency medical care to wounded Marines on the battlefield. Trained in triage, first aid, and battlefield medicine, this corpsman saved lives under fire.

BackstoryDef.title: Suburban Scout
BackstoryDef.description: Spent weekends camping, earning merit badges, and learning atomic safety drills. Knows how to tie knots and build a campfire, even with a Mister Handy’s help.

BackstoryDef.title: Nuka-Cola Junior Taster
BackstoryDef.description: Dreamed of winning the Nuka-Cola sweepstakes and sampled every flavor at the local soda shop. Developed a keen sense for taste and a love for catchy jingles.

BackstoryDef.title: Red Menace Fan
BackstoryDef.description: Collected every issue of Red Menace and practiced heroic poses in the mirror. Imaginative and patriotic, always ready to spot a “Commie” in the neighborhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Sugar Bombs Enthusiast
BackstoryDef.description: Started every morning with a bowl of Sugar Bombs and a Silver Shroud radio show. Energetic and creative, always ready for adventure.

BackstoryDef.title: RobCo Junior Tinkerer
BackstoryDef.description: Spent afternoons taking apart toys and trying to fix the family’s Mister Handy. Curious and inventive, with a knack for gadgets and gizmos.

BackstoryDef.title: Vault-Tec Lottery Kid
BackstoryDef.description: Practiced “duck and cover” drills and dreamed of living in a Vault. Read every Vault-Tec comic and believed every ad.

BackstoryDef.title: Suburban Gardener
BackstoryDef.description: Helped parents tend the backyard garden, learning the secrets of tomatoes and sunflowers. Developed patience and a green thumb.

BackstoryDef.title: Silver Shroud Fan
BackstoryDef.description: Listened to every Silver Shroud radio episode and reenacted heroic battles with friends. Inspired by justice and always ready to help others.

BackstoryDef.title: Super Duper Mart Helper
BackstoryDef.description: Spent weekends helping out at the local Super Duper Mart, stocking shelves and greeting customers. Learned the value of hard work and a friendly smile.

BackstoryDef.title: Prewar Schoolkid
BackstoryDef.description: Attended a bustling prewar school, learning about science, history, and atomic safety. Quick to make friends and always eager to learn something new.

BackstoryDef.title: Giddyup Buttercup Collector
BackstoryDef.description: Collected every model of Giddyup Buttercup, arranging them in elaborate stables and racing them with friends. Developed a love for toys and a knack for creative play.

BackstoryDef.title: Nuka-World Junior Explorer
BackstoryDef.description: Visited Nuka-World every summer, collecting maps and badges from every zone. Learned to navigate crowds, solve puzzles, and always find the nearest soda fountain.

BackstoryDef.title: Hubris Comics Superfan
BackstoryDef.description: Devoured every issue of Grognak the Barbarian and The Unstoppables, drawing their own comics and trading stories with friends. Imaginative and always ready for adventure.

BackstoryDef.title: Red Rocket Junior Mechanic
BackstoryDef.description: Spent afternoons in the garage, helping fix bikes and toy cars. Learned the basics of tools, teamwork, and the satisfaction of a job well done.

BackstoryDef.title: Science Fair Kid
BackstoryDef.description: Entered every science fair with homemade reactors and solar panels, inspired by Poseidon Energy ads. Curious and inventive, always asking “what if?”

BackstoryDef.title: Red Menace Cartoon Fan
BackstoryDef.description: Watched every episode of the Red Menace cartoon, memorizing catchphrases and reenacting battles with friends. Developed a flair for drama and a love of heroes.

BackstoryDef.title: Sugar Bombs Prize Winner
BackstoryDef.description: Won a Sugar Bombs contest and received a year’s supply of cereal. Became the envy of the neighborhood and learned the art of sharing (and trading) snacks.

BackstoryDef.title: Vault-Tec Science Club Member
BackstoryDef.description: Joined the Vault-Tec Science Club, building model Vaults and learning about atomic energy. Curious and inventive, always eager to experiment.

BackstoryDef.title: Nuka-World Arcade Champion
BackstoryDef.description: Spent hours at the Nuka-World arcade, mastering every game and collecting tickets for prizes. Developed quick reflexes and a competitive spirit.

BackstoryDef.title: Hubris Comics Drawing Contestant
BackstoryDef.description: Entered the Hubris Comics drawing contest, sending in sketches of superheroes and monsters. Artistic and imaginative, always doodling in the margins of homework.
